species.name: pineco
descriptions: A PINECO hangs from a tree branch and waits for prey. While eating, if it is disturbed by someone shaking its tree, it falls on the ground and suddenly explodes.
It hangs and waits for flying insect prey to come near. It does not move about much on its own.
It likes to make its shell thicker by adding layers of tree bark. The additional weight doesn't bother it.
It looks just like a pinecone. Its shell protects it from bird Pok√©mon that peck it by mistake.
It spits out a fluid that it uses to glue tree bark to its body. The fluid hardens when it touches air.

abilities.name: sturdy
abilities.effect: Prevents being KOed from full HP, leaving 1 HP instead.  Protects against the one-hit KO moves regardless of HP.
